original_text: The priest will cut all the fat from the goat as he did with the friendship offering. And he will burn it on the altar. This will make atonement for the wrong things that the person has done. The smell of it while it is burning will give the Lord pleasure. Then the Lord will forgive the person.
korean_text: 그 모든 기름을 화목제물의 기름을 떼어낸 것 같이 떼어내 제단 위에서 불살라 여호와께 향기롭게 할지니 제사장이 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: The priest will cut all the fat from the goat
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 염소에서 모든 기름을 자를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as he did with the friendship offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 화목 제물을 했던 것과 같이

sentences.original_text: And he will burn it on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그것을 제단에서 태울 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for the wrong things that the person has done
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람이 행한 잘못된 일들에 대해

sentences.original_text: The smell of it while it is burning
Then the Lord will forgive the person
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 주께서 그 사람을 용서하실 것입니다
